title: 3 and Out - Players Picking Wrong CBA Fight; Landry Injury; Carr Trade Rumors; Diggs Drama; Olsen Signing; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Players Picking Wrong CBA Fight; Landry Injury; Carr Trade Rumors; Diggs Drama; Olsen Signing; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff breaks down the issues at the heart of the upcoming CBA negotiations, including the 17-game season, why the players are picking the wrong fights in the negotiation, looks at some of the top headlines from the week, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
